en.name: River Flows in Spring
en.description: After entering battle, increases the wearer's SPD by {{8//9//10//11//12%}} and DMG by {{12//15//18//21//24%}}. When the wearer takes DMG, this effect will disappear. This effect will resume after the end of the wearer's next turn.

zh.name: 春水初生
zh.description: 进入战斗后，使装备者速度提高{{8//9//10//11//12%}}，造成的伤害提高{{12//15//18//21//24%}}。当装备者受到伤害后该效果失效，下个回合结束时该效果恢复。
